skill.name: docs-agent
skill.description: Maintains documentation files (README.md, .claude/claude.md, .claude/agent.md, API docs) for Unite-Hub. Ensures docs stay in sync with codebase changes. Uses Haiku model for cost-effective documentation generation.
skill.summary: Maintains documentation files (README.md, .claude/claude.md, .claude/agent.md, API docs) for Unite-H...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Prompt-based documentation skill containing only markdown instructions. No executable code, no network operations, no file system access beyond reading/writing documentation files.

content.value_statement: Documentation drift causes confusion and wasted time. This skill uses AI to automatically sync README files, API docs, and internal documentation with codebase changes.
actual_capabilities: Update README.md with new features and tech stack changes
Document new API endpoints with request/response examples
Keep documentation in sync with code changes
limitations: Designed specifically for Unite-Hub project structure
Does not generate video tutorials or interactive content
Requires manual prompting to trigger updates
Does not update external documentation platforms

use_cases.title: Sync docs with code changes
use_cases.description: Keep README and API docs accurate after each feature release

use_cases.title: Maintain internal documentation
use_cases.description: Update agent definitions and architecture docs systematically

use_cases.title: Generate changelog entries
use_cases.description: Automatically create release notes from code changes

prompt_templates.title: Update README
prompt_templates.prompt: Update README.md to reflect the new feature: [describe feature]

prompt_templates.title: Document API
prompt_templates.prompt: Document the new API endpoint at [path] including method, request body, response format, and error codes

prompt_templates.title: Create changelog
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a changelog entry for version [version] based on these changes: [list changes]

prompt_templates.title: Sync all docs
prompt_templates.prompt: Review all markdown documentation files and update them to reflect the current state of the codebase

output_examples.input: Update README.md to reflect the new bulk contact update API endpoint
output: Added new feature section for bulk contact updates
Updated API Documentation link to new endpoint
Verified all code examples are current

best_practices: Update docs immediately after code changes to prevent drift
Include code examples in all documentation updates
Verify documentation changes against source code before saving
anti_patterns: Batching multiple unrelated changes into one update
Using casual or informal tone in technical documentation
Skipping verification of code examples before publishing

faq.question: Does this work with Claude Sonnet or Opus?
faq.answer: Configured for Haiku by default but works with any Claude model for documentation tasks

faq.question: What documentation files can it update?
faq.answer: Supports README.md, .claude files, API docs, changelogs, and architecture documentation

faq.question: Does it integrate with external docs platforms?
faq.answer: Currently designed for markdown files in the project repository only

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads and writes documentation files within your project directory

faq.question: Why is my documentation not updating?
faq.answer: Ensure you provide specific details about what changed in the codebase for accurate updates

faq.question: How is this different from Codex documentation features?
faq.answer: Built specifically for Unite-Hub project structure with templates and workflows for this codebase
